title: Why do teenage girls fall in love with adults? - Quora

response.answer_text: These are the reasons why girls fall in love with adult men They are peaceful people and quiet as their neighbors in 740 Park AvenueThey are nature lovers, they like the scenery in Maui beachThey are sporty, they go skiing in winter in Aspen ColoradoThey have sophistication when it comes to foods, they dine in Brooklyn Star.They are religous as it may not seem. They say their prayers at Enclave in Cathedral.They are provident and responsible they make sure your supplies will not scarce, they will not let you walk out empty handed at Brooklyn Palace.They are very caring and thoughtful concern for your vitality for the day so they take you home with their Rolls-Royce Phantom Serenitywow, trully exceptional that’s why I admire uncle Woodrow Wilson for being close to women.
